sentences.cn: 在这整个蜘蛛出没的季节里，为什么不在你家里举行蜘蛛周竞赛？

sentences.en: Likewise, by these investigators’ logic, male arachnophobes should get a mild tickle down there whenever they spy a spider scurrying across their desk.
sentences.cn: 同样的，按这些研究者的逻辑，男性蜘蛛恐惧者每次看到蜘蛛爬过桌子都应该下身瘙痒咯？

sentences.cn: 当她学习了该如何做这的时候,我准备好让在一个小丑上的她步骤.

sentences.cn: 新当选的总统紧随其后，坐着6匹灰色骏马开道的敞篷马车。

sentences.cn: 节食和锻炼相结合是最有效的。

sentences.en: She was an accomplished pianist, a superb swimmer, and a gifted artist.

sentences.en: She can feel the child quickening at times.

sentences.cn: 他有时候和野生动物有近距离的接触，但也只是那些动物主动靠近他。

sentences.cn: 我们已经尽力，算了吧。

sentences.en: Well yes, in some ways, but it is basically the same process.
sentences.cn: 恩，在某些方面只这样的，但基本上过程是相同的。

sentences.en: In some ways, each of us is like every person on earth; in some ways, each of us is like the members of our culture and group; and, in some ways, each of us is unique.
sentences.cn: 在某些方面，我们每个人都像地球上的所有人；在某些方面，我们每个人都像我们文化与群体中的成员；还有，在某些方面，我们每个人都是独一无二的。

sentences.cn: 海滩上的每一颗豌豆和桃子孔雀都能触及.

sentences.en: Kitty and Peter have decided to see Swan Lake'this saturday.
sentences.cn: 这个星期六基蒂和彼得决定去看“天鹅湖”。

sentences.en: There we’d find a rowboat that we could take to yet another trail, which would eventually lead us to Swan Lake.
sentences.cn: 在那里我们可以找到一条小船，划船到另外一条小道，最后可以到达天鹅湖。

sentences.cn: 影片在天鹅湖的序幕中开始，魔法师罗斯巴特施恶咒将公主变成了天鹅。

sentences.cn: 和我们这一代的大多数人一样，我并没有经历过战争。

sentences.en: It’s very noble of you to spend all your weekends helping the old folk.

sentences.cn: 崇高的理想

sentences.en: But “the hostile part can be mobilized from time to time,” by what he calls “anti-immigrant entrepreneurs.
sentences.cn: 但是“敌对的那部分可能会不时地动员”，以他称之为“反移民企业家”的名义。

sentences.en: The good news is that the anti-immigrant message may not play as well in Florida in the general election.
sentences.cn: 好消息是，在整个选举过程中，反移民信息的作用可能不会像在佛罗里达那么显著。

sentences.en: That such a woman would want more for her daughter than someone who was a failed boxer, a doorman, and an illegal immigrant seemed to him perfectly reasonable.
sentences.cn: 在他看来，这样一个女人想要给自己的女儿找一个比失败的拳击手、看门人和非法移民更好的男人，是完全合理的。

sentences.en: I saw her tap dancing on our kitchen floor.
sentences.cn: 我看到她在厨房的地板上跳踢踏舞；

sentences.en: Yes, he's a pimp. He's a big, tap dancing pimp!
sentences.cn: 他是个拉皮条的，他是个喜欢半夜起来跳踢踏舞的拉皮条的。

sentences.en: The other one, Cameron 's movie [Elizabethtown], she starts tap dancing.

sentences.en: Is this a realistic target?
sentences.cn: 这个目标能够实现吗？

sentences.cn: 儿童到了七岁就具有抽象思维的能力。

sentences.en: One cannot fix one's eyes on the commonest natural production without finding food for a rambling fancy.
sentences.cn: 一个人注视一个最普通的自然产品不会不发现一种不著边际想像的食物。

trans.tranCn: 动物；（有特性或特质的）人

sentences.cn: 海洋中所有的生物

phrases.cn: n. 物质享受（尤指食物）

sentences.cn: 当地画家的画展

sentences.cn: 一幅名贵的画

sentences.cn: 他们最值钱的财物锁在卧室保险箱里。

sentences.cn: 典型的英国天气

sentences.en: This advertisement is a typical example of their marketing strategy.
sentences.cn: 这则广告是他们营销策略的一个典型例子。

sentences.en: The ultimate issue is your ability to think about and conceptualize 'something to say' and once you have done that, find the language that allows you to say it most directly and elegantly.
sentences.cn: 最终的问题在于你对“要说的东西”进行思考和概念化的能力，一旦你拥有了这种能力，那么就要找到一种语言，让你可以更直接且优美地表达出来。

sentences.en: The report emphasizes the importance of improving safety standards.
sentences.cn: 报告强调了改进安全标准的重要性。

sentences.en: Logan made a speech emphasizing the need for more volunteers.
sentences.cn: 罗根发表演讲，强调需要更多的志愿者。

sentences.en: This issue will be discussed in more detail in Chapter 5.
sentences.cn: 这个问题将在第五章里作更为详细的论述。

sentences.en: Clean the surface with a damp cloth.
sentences.cn: 用一块湿布清洗表面。

sentences.en: Bend back the card and cut along the fold.
sentences.cn: 打开折好的卡纸，然后沿折痕剪开。

sentences.en: a shallow river
sentences.cn: 浅河

sentences.en: The lake is quite shallow.
sentences.cn: 这湖很浅。

sentences.en: the shallow end of the pool
sentences.cn: 游泳池的浅水区

sentences.en: We could see a boat about a mile from shore.
sentences.cn: 我们看见离岸边大约一英里的地方有一艘船。

sentences.en: Only a few survivors reached the shore.
sentences.cn: 仅有几个生还者到达岸边。

sentences.en: She began to swim to shore.
sentences.cn: 她开始朝岸边游去。

sentences.en: He had a problem with his eyesight.
sentences.cn: 他的视力有问题。

sentences.en: The columns were of white marble.
sentences.cn: 柱子是白色的大理石。

sentences.en: a marble statue
sentences.cn: 大理石雕像

phrases.cn: 大理石拱门（有名的伦敦标志）

sentences.cn: 这些柱子必须固定在混凝土中。

sentences.en: Air bags are a standard feature in most new cars.
sentences.cn: 气囊是大多数新车的标准配置。

sentences.en: Striped tails are a common feature of many animals.
sentences.cn: 尾巴上有条纹是许多动物的共同特征。

sentences.en: The hotel’s only redeeming features (= things that make it acceptable ) were that it was cheap and near the city centre.
sentences.cn: 这家旅馆仅有的可取之处就是价格低廉并且靠近市中心。

phrases.cn: 主要特征；主要特点；主景；功能特点

sentences.en: Has your flat got a balcony?
sentences.cn: 你的公寓有阳台吗？

sentences.en: They finally found the cat up on the roof.
sentences.cn: 他们最后在屋顶上找到了那只猫。

sentences.cn: 平顶

sentences.en: a pitched roof
sentences.cn: 斜顶

sentences.en: Churchill’s statue stands outside the parliament building.
sentences.cn: 丘吉尔的塑像矗立在议会大厦外。

sentences.en: A bronze statue was erected in his honour.
sentences.cn: 人们立了一座铜像纪念他。

sentences.cn: 破败的城堡

sentences.en: The skyscraper towers into the clouds.
sentences.cn: 那幢摩天大楼高耸入云。

sentences.en: He talks of building a “digital skyscraper,” a company whose services are so indispensable that someday we will look back and wonder how we managed to do without it.
sentences.cn: 他谈到要建立一座“数字摩天楼”，其服务是如此不可或缺，以至于会有那么一天，我们将怀疑没有它到底还能做什么。

sentences.en: Referring to two helicopters bought by the village for sightseers, Zhou Li said: 'The air flight project and our new skyscraper are our ways to improve the quality of tourism.
sentences.cn: 指着两架买来为观光者使用的直升机，周丽说：“这个空中飞行项目和我们新建的摩天楼都是我们来提升旅游质量的举措。

sentences.en: the angel Gabriel
sentences.cn: 天使加百列

sentences.en: But I am an architect.
sentences.cn: 但是我是一名建筑师。

sentences.en: They commissioned an architect to design the new library.
sentences.cn: 他们委托一位建筑师设计这座新图书馆。

sentences.en: The building was constructed from the design of that architect.
sentences.cn: 这幢大楼是按那位建筑师的设计建造的。

系统架构师；系统结构设计员

sentences.en: This illness has ruined my life.
sentences.cn: 这个病毁掉了我的生活。

sentences.en: His career would be ruined.
sentences.cn: 他的事业将被毁掉。

sentences.en: All this mud’s going to ruin my shoes.
sentences.cn: 这泥巴会把我的鞋弄坏。

sentences.cn: 内斯湖

phrases.cn: 尼斯湖水怪（相传在尼斯湖出现的一种巨型怪兽）

sentences.en: Oh I forgot... .this is just a fairytale!
sentences.cn: 哦，我忘了... 这仅仅是一个童话故事！

sentences.en: After a whirlwind courtship and a fairytale wedding the couple had settled down to an urban lifestyle.
sentences.cn: 在一段旋风般的热恋和一个童话式的婚礼之后，夫妻俩定居下来，过起了都市生活。

sentences.en: That was sold as a fairytale wedding, but from the point of view of most of the public, it turned out to be one of those fairytales that don't have a happy ending.
sentences.cn: 那是当作童话式的婚礼推销的，但是从对大部分市民的角度来看，它最终是变成了那些没有幸福结局的童话故事之一。

sentences.en: He was very skilled at pointing down the blocks of granite.
sentences.cn: 他善于把花岗岩石凿平。

sentences.en: If you're working in steel or granite, redesigning or adding onto something is very expensive.
sentences.cn: 如果你用钢或花岗岩来工作，重新设计或增加一些东西是很贵的。

sentences.en: Because water is the softest substance in the world, but yet it can  penetrate the hardest rock or anything --  granite, you name it.
sentences.cn: 因为水是世界上最柔软的物质，但是它却可以穿透最坚硬的岩石，或者说花岗岩等石材。

sentences.en: We went to a cafe and lazed the whole afternoon away there.
sentences.cn: 我们去了一间咖啡馆，在那儿消磨了整个下午。

sentences.en: Marshal turned to watch her as she walked through the cafe, then he turned to us.
sentences.cn: 元帅转向看她，她走过的咖啡馆，然后他转过身来给我们。

sentences.en: At a cat “cafe,” the emphasis is not on food and beverages but relaxing in the company of cats.
sentences.cn: 在猫咪咖啡馆，重点不在于食物和饮料，而在于有猫咪陪伴的那份轻松愉快。

phrases.cn: 菲尼克斯太阳队（美国著名篮球队）
菲尼克斯（德国一电气公司）

sentences.en: The cock (or rooster) bristled his crest.
sentences.cn: 公鸡竖起了鸡冠。

sentences.en: A bat echolocates the direction.
sentences.cn: 蝙蝠凭回声测定方向。

sentences.en: Having been suggested by a bat, people invented sonar.
sentences.cn: 受到蝙蝠的启发，人们发明了声呐。

sentences.en: It is technically incorrect to talk about bat ‘radar’, since they do not use radio waves.
sentences.cn: 严密来说，说蝙蝠有“雷达”系统是错误的，因为他们并不使用无线电波。

sentences.en: the family tomb
sentences.cn: 家族坟墓

sentences.en: Many academic institutions in India — some of which are very strong — date back to the British days.
sentences.cn: 印度的许多学术机构——其中一些实力很强——可以追溯到英国统治时期。

sentences.en: The international collaboration found that A(H1N1) is made up of genes from flu viruses seen in birds, humans and pigs — and parts of its genetic make-up date back to the 1918 influenza pandemic.
sentences.cn: 这项国际合作研究发现甲型H1N1流感是由来自鸟类、人类和猪的流感病毒基因组成的——而且其部分基因构成可以追溯到1918年流感大流行。

sentences.en: These games date back to the time of serial consoles, mainframes, and minicomputers.
sentences.cn: 这些游戏的历史可以追溯到串行控制台、大型机和小型机时代。

sentences.en: The Habsburg dynasty ruled in Austria from 1278 to 1918.
sentences.cn: 哈布斯堡王朝在1278至1918年间统治奥地利。

sentences.en: I don’t share her religious beliefs .
sentences.cn: 她的宗教信仰和我的不同。

sentences.en: a religious school
sentences.cn: 宗教学校

sentences.en: the dates of major religious observances such as Easter or Christmas
sentences.cn: 复活节和圣诞节等重要宗教节日的日期

sentences.en: Nick had no particular purpose in mind when he started.
sentences.cn: 尼克开始的时候头脑中并没有明确的目标。

sentences.en: Weather patterns have changed in recent years.
sentences.cn: 气候模式近年已经发生了变化。

sentences.en: A general pattern began to emerge .
sentences.cn: 一个总体模式开始显现。

sentences.en: Their descriptions seemed to follow a set pattern (= always develop in the same way ) .
sentences.cn: 他们的描述似乎依据固定的模式。

phrases.cn: 流型，流动型态；活动模；流线谱

sentences.cn: 汉字中的“马”

sentences.en: Juliet’s eyes shone with happiness.
sentences.cn: 朱丽叶的双眼闪耀着幸福的光芒。

sentences.en: We want our children to have the best possible chance of happiness.
sentences.cn: 我们希望自己的孩子得到追求幸福的最佳机会。

phrases.cn: 知足常乐；幸福在于满足

sentences.cn: 整个山谷回荡着庙宇的钟声。

sentences.cn: …神道教仪式中最神圣的部分，祭品在夜间献给伟大的太阳神。

sentences.en: I wanted to try the boat out next weekend.
sentences.cn: 我想下个周末去试一下这艘船。

sentences.cn: 一些车主希望他们能在一条跑道上试一下那辆车。

sentences.cn: 我每逢月初交付房租。

sentences.cn: 他的房东把房租提高了一倍。

sentences.cn: 冻住的污水管

sentences.en: The landlord pays cleaners who come daily, and there is a dingy shared washroom where residents can clean their belongings.
sentences.cn: 房东雇了清洁工每天来打扫，还有一个昏暗的公用盥洗室，供住户们洗自己的东西。

sentences.en: Wipe the leather with a damp cloth.
sentences.cn: 用湿布擦拭皮面。

sentences.cn: 寒冷潮湿的一天

sentences.en: His students are generally much better at bathtub dynamics by the end of his course, which gives him hope.
sentences.cn: 在完成他的课程之后，他的学生对浴缸动力学的理解普遍好多了，这给了他希望。

sentences.en: And the neighbor down the street found in the bathtub… And the kid who ran his motorcycle into a tree an accident but for the note left behind saying that's exactly what he intended to do… And so on.
sentences.cn: 还有那个街上的邻居，被人发现在浴缸里自杀了……还记着有个小年轻骑摩托车撞到了树上，大家认为这是个意外，但是这个小孩留的字条上说他是一心寻死的，等等。

sentences.en: Behind the bedroom were an old kitchen and a bathroom so small the toilet seat sometimes scraped against the bathtub.
sentences.cn: 卧室的后面是一个旧的厨房和一间浴室，浴室非常小，抽水马桶的盖子有时竞会碰擦到浴缸。

sentences.en: They bought an old schoolhouse to live in and built a workshop in the basement.
sentences.cn: 他们买了座旧校舍居住，还在地下室建了个作坊。

sentences.en: I bathed, washed my hair, and got dressed.
sentences.cn: 我洗了澡，洗了头，然后穿上衣服。

sentences.en: He bathed the children and put them to bed.
sentences.cn: 他给孩子们洗了澡，然后把他们弄上床。

phrases.cn: [主英国英语] 去洗一次海(或河、湖)水浴；去游泳

sentences.en: Villagers say the fence would restrict public access to the hills.
sentences.cn: 村民们说栅栏将限制公众进入山区。

phrases.cn: 越过场端；不讲道理的 ，不公正的

sentences.cn: 楼梯非常狭窄。

sentences.cn: 窄长的云带

sentences.cn: 我把车停到车库去。

sentences.en: Can you take out the garbage when you go?

sentences.cn: 她住在一套小公寓里。

sentences.cn: 纽约市的地铁

sentences.cn: 拥挤的地铁站

sentences.en: Boston has the oldest subway system in the US.
sentences.cn: 波士顿拥有美国最老的地铁运输系统。

sentences.en: By day he worked downtown for American Standard.
sentences.cn: 白天，他在市中心为美国标准公司工作。

sentences.en: ...an office in downtown Chicago.
sentences.cn: …芝加哥市中心的一间办公室。

phrases.cn: 曼哈顿闹市区（纽约市中心商业地带）

sentences.en: Now and then they heard the roar of a heavy lorry.
sentences.cn: 他们不时听见一辆重型卡车的轰响声。

phrases.cn: 货车吊机；机动式起重吊车

sentences.en: red velvet curtains
sentences.cn: 红色的丝绒窗帘

sentences.en: The air conditioner was just what the Brooklyn printer needed.
sentences.cn: 这种空调设备正好是布鲁克林印刷机所需要的。

sentences.en: There’s no denying, though, that a good air conditioner can beat the heat.
sentences.cn: 可是，不可否认的是，好的空调设备可以抵御炎热。

sentences.en: However, for a while the land around the city acted as a natural air conditioner, keeping the air cool through evaporation of moisture from the ground.
sentences.cn: 不过，有一段时间，莫斯科市周围的土地起到了自然空调的作用，通过从地面蒸发湿气保持空气凉爽。

sentences.en: These are the report’s main conclusions.
sentences.cn: 这些就是这篇报告的主要结论。

sentences.en: It is still too early to reach a conclusion on this point.
sentences.cn: 在这一点上作出结论还为时过早。

sentences.en: There are perhaps two main conclusions to be drawn from the above discussion.
sentences.cn: 从以上的讨论也许可以得出两个主要的结论。
